src.preprocess.preprocess.too_short(df_data, threshold=52)[source]¶

Check if number of entries is long enough.

Parameters
df_data: pd.DataFrame

Data to check.

threshold: int

Minimum lenght.

Returns
bool

True if preprocess is long enough.

src.preprocess.preprocess.too_small(df_data, capacity, threshold=0.25)[source]¶

Check if values of preprocess is greater than threshold x capacity of transformer.

Parameters
df_data: pd.DataFrame

Data to check.

capacity: int

Capacity of the transformer.

threshold: int

Fraction of the capacity that should be reached.

Returns
bool

True if preprocess exists that is greater than threshold x capacity.

Parameters

capacity: int

Capacity of the transformer.

threshold: int

Returns
pd.DataFrame
